original_title: No alliances with those who ruined the country, SJB
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa dismissed calls for the formation of a national government, noting that the Samagi Jana Balavegaya led alliance would never join hands with those who ruined the country.
Speaking at the SJB May Day Rally in Colombo on Monday (1), he said that the Samagi Jana Balavegaya stands to change the political system in the country.
